# UICollectionView.SelfSizingInvalidation.enabled

**Case**

A mode that enables manual self-sizing invalidation.

## Declaration

```swift
case enabled
```

## Discussion

If you use this self-sizing invalidation mode, calling [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView/invalidateIntrinsicContentSize()] on a self-sizing cell or its [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionViewCell/contentView] causes the cell to resize if necessary.

## Constants

- **UICollectionView.SelfSizingInvalidation.disabled**: A mode that disables self-sizing invalidation.
- **UICollectionView.SelfSizingInvalidation.enabledIncludingConstraints**: A mode that enables automatic self-sizing invalidation after Auto Layout changes.
